resource.description: The ``AWS::ApiGateway::UsagePlanKey`` resource associates an API key with a usage plan. This association determines which users the usage plan is applied to.

properties.name: KeyId
properties.description: The Id of the UsagePlanKey resource.

type.description: The Id of the UsagePlanKey resource.

properties.name: KeyType
properties.description: The type of a UsagePlanKey resource for a plan customer.

type.description: The type of a UsagePlanKey resource for a plan customer.

properties.name: UsagePlanId
properties.description: The Id of the UsagePlan resource representing the usage plan containing the UsagePlanKey resource representing a plan customer.

type.description: The Id of the UsagePlan resource representing the usage plan containing the UsagePlanKey resource representing a plan customer.

attributes.description: The ``AWS::ApiGateway::UsagePlanKey`` resource associates an API key with a usage plan. This association determines which users the usage plan is applied to.
